languages.text: {n}Когда вы поднимаете взгляд на алтарь, звон в ушах на мгновение усиливается. Разрывая барабанные перепонки, алтарь ревет, угрожает, обещает забрать с собой тысячи других. Но вы глухи к его жалким угрозам.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Атака по алтарю, можно еще что-то отколоть

languages.text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы поднимаете взгляд на алтарь, звон в ушах на мгновение усиливается. Разрывая барабанные перепонки, алтарь ревет, угрожает, обещает забрать с собой тысячи других. Но вы глухи к его жалким угрозам.{/n}

{n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du zu dem Altar hinaufblickst, wird das Läuten in deinen Ohren für einen Moment lauter. Der Altar strapaziert deine Trommelfelle und brüllt das Versprechen, Tausende mitzureißen. Doch du bist taub für seine jämmerlichen Drohungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du zu dem Altar hinaufblickst, wird das Läuten in deinen Ohren für einen Moment lauter. Der Altar strapaziert deine Trommelfelle und brüllt das Versprechen, Tausende mitzureißen. Doch du bist taub für seine jämmerlichen Drohungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous levez les yeux vers l'autel, le sifflement dans vos oreilles s'intensifie subitement. L'abomination mugit et vous déchire les tympans, promettant d'en emporter des milliers d'autres dans sa chute, mais vous restez {mf|sourd|sourde} à ses vaines menaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous levez les yeux vers l'autel, le sifflement dans vos oreilles s'intensifie subitement. L'abomination mugit et vous déchire les tympans, promettant d'en emporter des milliers d'autres dans sa chute, mais vous restez {mf|sourd|sourde} à ses vaines menaces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你抬起头，看着那座祭坛时，你耳中的嗡嗡声立刻变得更响了。那座祭坛咆哮着，威胁着，发誓会害死更多的人，声音几乎要震破你的耳膜。然而，你对它无力的威胁充耳不闻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你抬起头，看着那座祭坛时，你耳中的嗡嗡声立刻变得更响了。那座祭坛咆哮着，威胁着，发誓会害死更多的人，声音几乎要震破你的耳膜。然而，你对它无力的威胁充耳不闻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando levantas la mirada hacia el altar, el pitido se intensifica durante un momento. El altar ruge amenazador, perforando tus tímpanos, con la promesa de llevarse a miles consigo. Haces oídos sordos a sus patéticas amenazas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando levantas la mirada hacia el altar, el pitido se intensifica durante un momento. El altar ruge amenazador, perforando tus tímpanos, con la promesa de llevarse a miles consigo. Haces oídos sordos a sus patéticas amenazas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}祭壇を見上げると、耳鳴りが一瞬激しくなった。鼓膜を破るような轟きと共に、祭壇は怒号し、さらに何千もの命を奪うと脅し、誓った。しかし、あなたはその哀れな脅しに耳を貸さなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭壇を見上げると、耳鳴りが一瞬激しくなった。鼓膜を破るような轟きと共に、祭壇は怒号し、さらに何千もの命を奪うと脅し、誓った。しかし、あなたはその哀れな脅しに耳を貸さなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başını kaldırıp sunağa baktığın sırada kulaklarındaki çınlama, bir anlığına daha da yoğunlaşıyor. Kulak zarlarını yırtan sunak, tehditkâr bir şekilde kükreyerek binlercesini daha alacağını haykırıyor ancak bu acınası tehditlere kulak asmıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look up at the altar, the ringing in your ears intensifies for a moment. Rupturing your eardrums, the altar roars, threatening, promising to take thousands more with it. But you are deaf to its pitiful threats.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Başını kaldırıp sunağa baktığın sırada kulaklarındaki çınlama bir anlığına daha da yoğunlaşır. Kulak zarlarını yırtan sunak, tehditkâr bir şekilde kükreyerek binlercesini daha alacağını haykırır ancak bu acınası tehditlere kulak asmazsın.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Атака по алтарю, можно еще что-то отколоть
